data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we hereby inform you that the Company is uploading the attached Investor Presentation, along with periodic updation, on its website www.gujaratgas.com . The presentation was not presented by the Company Officials in any Investor/Analyst Meeting/Conference.
